gold_answers: Adjust oven rack to center position and preheat to 350°F (180°C). Working with one pumpkin at a time, use a sharp paring knife to cut the top of the pumpkin off in one piece. Using the paring knife, scrape seeds and pulp from the tops as well. Discard seeds and pulp or reserve for another use. Repeat with remaining pumpkins.
